definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to make oneself presentable/to freshen up
to comb through (historical documents etc)/to unravel

sentences.english: Boccaccino recommends that you use professional nursing combed wool.
sentences.chinese: 卡奇諾引薦您運用專業的羊毛護理梳。

sentences.english: The hair beautification comb which is convenient to carry does not easily pollute skin or clothing.
sentences.chinese: 該髮梳攜帶方便，不污染皮膚或衣物。

sentences.english: We will be growing our hair into backcombed bunches and glossing our lips scarlet
sentences.chinese: 把頭髮用梳子倒梳，猩紅脣色王道。

sentences.english: Cave Restaurant is the only place under the sun that sells shrimp and scallop dumplings.
sentences.chinese: 出售蝦仁彎梳餃的仙人居餐館，天下獨此一家。

sentences.english: The mother I had in mind for myself was middle-aged with brown hair pulled back in a bun .
sentences.chinese: 我心目中的母親是梳粑粑頭的棕發中年婦人。

sentences.english: Those kinds of fiber lasers can be excellent optical sources for astro-combs.
sentences.chinese: 此類光纖激光器可用作天文光學頻率梳的理想光源。

sentences.english: Distribute the liquid evenly through your hair with a wide-tooth comb.
sentences.chinese: 用寬牙髮梳平均地將護髮液分佈在發。

sentences.english: Adding baking soda to the batter help to hold the swirls on the cookies.
sentences.chinese: 加入梳打粉，有助令曲奇上的花紋更凸出。

sentences.english: Please wash your hair, or at the very least, brush it.
sentences.chinese: 要洗頭髮，或者至少，你得梳梳。

sentences.english: Please wash your hair, or at the very least, brush it.
sentences.chinese: 要洗頭髮，或者至少，你得梳梳。

sentences.english: Scorpions have unique sensory combs, called pectines, on their dorsal sides.
sentences.chinese: 蠍子的背側上長有一排被稱之爲櫛狀器的獨特感應梳。

sentences.english: Finally, the stability of the laser determines the width of the individual comb teeth.
sentences.chinese: 最後，激光的穩定性決定了頻率梳單個齒的寬度。

sentences.english: The Celestial Cave Restaurant is the only place under the sun that sells shrimp and scallop dumplings.
sentences.chinese: 出售蝦仁彎梳餃的仙人居餐館，天下獨此一家。

sentences.english: Continue using the shorter comb gauge to fade the hair lighter and shorter.
sentences.chinese: 繼續用短齒梳剪將頭髮剪短打薄。

sentences.english: Fine or coarse animal hair, not carded or combed.
sentences.chinese: 未梳的動物細毛或粗毛。

sentences.english: I am convinced that the addition of this pinch of soda will definitely make the chicken juicier.
sentences.chinese: 我絕對相信加入微量的梳打粉能令雞件更富肉汁。

definition: hair worn in a bun or coil
Mawei district of Fuzhou city 福州市[Fu2 zhou1 shi4], Fujian
ponytail (hairstyle)/horse's tail/slender fibers like horse's tail (applies to various plants)
hair rolled up in a bun, topknot
scissors/shears/clippers/CL:把[ba3]/to cut with scissors/to trim/to wipe out or exterminate
